original_title: Jan Peerce, Marian Anderson & Andres Segovia
overview: This historic film contains performances by three legends of the world of music. In this rare footage, we can once again enjoy the beauty of the art which is their legacy JAN PEERCE and NADINE CONNER: The magnificent voices of Peerce and Conner join together to perform the three arias for which they are famous.O Paradiso (from Meyerbeers "LAfricaine"), Norinas Aria (from Donizettis "Don Pasquale"), Duet (From Donizettis "Lucia di Lammermoor"). MARIAN ANDERSON: Vignettes of the great singers life, from her early years through herTown Hall recital. A program of traditional spiritual favorites which include Begrussing , O What A Beautiful City, Hes Got The Whole World In His Hands, Crucifixion , Deep River, Comin Thro The Rye, Ave Maria. ANDRÉS SEGOVIA:.The great guitarist admits the audience into the seclusion of his Paris studio. Traditional and Contemporary numbers include Prelude (Bach). Theme and Variations (Sor), Sonatina (Torroba), Spanish Song (Traditional).
title: Jan Peerce, Marian Anderson & Andres Segovia
